resources.string: Every other activity can be accessed here. The user can choose from the category (carboon is clickable). Clicking on pic (handling with Picasso API) open a new screen with songs ListView. Data of music arrives from online database such as Google-Music-API.

This activity display in ListView, the music playlist what made by the user. Playlist has two functions.First when the user listens to the music on the screen, and pressing on an playlist will open the songs activity, showing and after playing the songs with buy activity where play the choosen song from user list or searching new, add as favourite, or purchase that. Second is make Playlists. The user can add new list or new songs to the list because the favourite songs are automatically displayed here and user can move them to the lists.

This activity lists in ListView the music what user buyed sorted by Artist. Pressing on album name, will open the album activity and there user will can open the songs and after the buy activity. In the toolbar menu will open the search or share activity, with connect to a database with Retrofit-API.

ListView of songs what user buyed sorted by Album. Pressing on an album will open the songs activity showing and after playing the songs with buy activity, where play the choosen song from user album or searching new, add as favourite, or purchase that with Android Pay API.In the toolbar menu will open the search or share activity, with connect to a database with Retrofit-API.

This activity will handle the playing of song using MediaPlayer API from user list, or searching new songs, add as favourite, or purchase that. After added to basket, user can purchase the song through for using Google-Music-API.In the toolbar menu will open the search activity, what connect to a database with Retrofit-API.

This activity show the songs of choosen category, in the ListView. After pressing on a song, will open the buy activity where user can play the song with Google-Music-API or Media Player API. There user can purchase songs with Google Play In-App Billing API or Android Pay API. All song are in ListView, ID pictures will handle with Picasso API, and Retrofit API will handling the network calls. Also can use the MediaStore.Audio API – searching / listing available media on device, MediaPlayer API to playback audio, AudioManager API – correctly requesting and releasing media focus, handling focus loss for playing the songs.
POP Music Playlist 2017 (Songs of All Time)
Summer Special April Mix (Songs of Chill Out)
